careerBackground: From a young age I was enthusiast about Computer Graphics and Video Games and I wanted to learn how to create images and animations, so I began programming in C and Assembly on my glorious Amiga computer in 1994. Later, I discovered Java and web technologies such as HTML, JavaScript, CSS, XML. I became a Java Developer in 2003 and since then I have been using Java for programming web applications and GUIs. Lately, I began programming native apps for OS X and iOS and I created software for digital signage and interactive surfaces.
role: As a Product Developer I create digital products using the latest technologies and applying the best practices of software development. I enjoy learning new technologies, improving my skills, and sharing my knowledge with my colleagues. My expertise is mainly with Java, JavaEE, Java tools and frameworks, Continuous Integration tools, Web technologies, Cocoa and Objective C.
superHeroPower: Super coding - to write code with mind power so I can be faster than ever.
